channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Someone has hit the street light it is now at an angle and they have also knocked down the road sign, 21st April
item.description:
Concerns about the street light as it is bent towards the house opposite and the street sign could fall or be thrown into the road. This happened at the weekend (Easter weekend) so it may already have been reported.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Orchard Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hazardous rubble left in road, 20th April
item.description:
The road by the entrance to the Churham Homes building site from Greenway Lane is covered with rubble. Stones and dust clouds are being thrown up by vehicles driving past risking damage to cars and a serious hazzard to pedestrians. Please can you arrange for this to be cleared urgently?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Greenway Lane, Battledown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No access along footpath. Blocked by a fence between 10 and 12 Gilpin Avenue, 20th April
item.description:
Fence across footpath and no longer access to field and stream, from Gilpin Avenue. Also fly tipping on stream side if access area from field.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Gilpin Avenue, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement/kerb collapsing into road, 20th April
item.description:
Pavement/kerb collapsing. Will be dangerous for blind/partially sighted people and wheelchair users.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 56 Humber Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Works van routinely parked on grass verge, 20th April
item.description:
A works van is parked on the grass verge on a daily basis. This is destroying the grass verge and represents a danger to pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Cheviot Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hedgerow overgrown onto pavement, 20th April
item.description:
The hedgerow has overgrown and is restricting access to the pavement for pedestrians, but is a particular issue for people with mobility issues and families with pushchairs
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 48 Pennine Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedges onto the pavement, 20th April
item.description:
Overgrown hedges are restricting pavement access for pedestrians, but particularly people with restricted mobility.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Cheviot Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous dip in road surface on corner j11a southbound exit sliproad, 19th April
item.description:
There is a dangerous dip in the exit slip road that’s been getting worse over the last 3 years. Today it caused my car to bottom out and swerve across the lane. If it was vusier this would have caused an accident resulting in serious injury and possibly death.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree needs replacing, 19th April
item.description:
Tree died many years ago and was removed. A replacement is required, previously reported as 2 trees needed replacing one either side of the Avenue , 1 was done but this one wasn't. No idea why it wasn't done when the other one was.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 24 Jersey Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead tree, 19th April
item.description:
The tree on the right hand side of the Avenue as you head down the Avenue has died. It needs to be removed and a new one planted. Previously reported.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 122 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken public bicycle pump, 18th April
item.description:
The public bicycle pump on Cheltenham High Street near John Lewis has broken or been vandalised. The lever that locks the pump outlet onto the tyre valve has broken off, just visible in photo. Please could you arrange for this to be fixed?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 143 High Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Racist graffiti, 18th April
item.description:
Please remove

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 136 Swindon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped Bike, 18th April
item.description:
There is a dumped bicycle in the hedge / verge next to the telegraph pole

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 92 Henley Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Large hole, 18th April
item.description:
2’ square hole appeared on the road, along with multiple other smaller holes and cracks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 Shaw Green Lane, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking lines very worn and faded, 17th April
item.description:
Along both sides of granville the car parking lines are very faded and hard to see, the whole road needs a resurface as many potholes and the road is stoney due to it crumbling. Swindon street just parrell has been resurfaced and new parking bay lines have been drawn which is needed in granville.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Granville Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
